DOC.criteria: Men woman 18 65 year old . Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥25 < 30 kg/m2 . Adequate cultural level understand clinical trial . Signed informed consent Individuals BMI ≥30 < 25 kg/m2 Vegetarians individual fiber intake ≥30 g/day Individuals diagnose Diabetes Mellitus Individuals dyslipidemia pharmacological treatment Individuals hypertension pharmacological treatment Smokers heavy drinking individual ( > 23 servings/day men > 1 serving/day woman ( 1 serving=1 glass wine 1 bottle beer ) ) Individuals large weight fluctuation undergone recent month weight loss diet Individuals gastrointestinal disease affect digestion absorption nutrient Individuals receive least precede 2 month pharmacological treatment modifies lipid profile ( example , statins , fibrates , diuretic , corticosteroid , oral antidiabetic medication ) Pregnant breastfeed woman Women menstrual irregularity ( absence menstrual cycle least 2 month prior ) Individuals intense physical activity
